detail_desc: Long cardigan in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, front pockets and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.

Lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying functional rustle fabric designed for running with a stand-up collar with an elastic drawstring at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip, airholes under the arms and elasticated cuffs. Seam with an elastic drawstring at the back of the waist, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Body in ribbed jersey with a low-cut back, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with belt loops and pleats, a zip fly and button, side pockets and tapered legs. Relaxed fit.
Loose-fitting vest top in linen slub jersey with a deep neckline. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Dungarees in sturdy cotton twill in a loose, relaxed fit with adjustable straps, an open chest pocket and buttons at the side. Button fly, side and back pockets and straight, wide legs with a loop and leg pocket.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fitted, long-sleeved, turtleneck top in airy jersey with a burnout pattern.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Super skinny fit – a close-fitting, slightly shorter style with narrow sleeves and darts at the back creating a completely fitted silhouette.
Hair grips in metal decorated with sparkly stones in plastic and glass. Length 6 cm.
Treggings in sturdy, stretch jersey with concealed elastication at the waist.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with mesh sections and a racer back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, glittery cotton jersey with a gathered seam and small frill trim at the waist, and a flared skirt.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved dress in a crêpe weave with a rubber print, scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Baby Exclusive. Trousers in double-weave, crinkled organic cotton with an elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back with a raw-edge lace trim.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a frill and narrow shoulder straps, one with a sewn-on metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle on the flap, an inner pocket and a metal chain shoulder strap. Size 4x15x17 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neck, decorative stitching at the back and short slits in the sides. Ribbed hem, and ribbing and a short slit at the cuffs.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.

Non-wired thong body in soft microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed ribbed trim under the bust and a lined gusset.
Pouch bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 15x22 cm.

Lace bralette with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication under the bust and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a high waist, pleats at the front, a concealed zip in one side and two slits at the front. Unlined.
Leggings in washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Trousers in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high, elasticated waist with pleats, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a boat neck and gathers at the sides for best fit.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces with metal details and sparkly stone decorations and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and decorative buttons down the front.
Short coat in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, zip and wind flap at the front and front pockets. Lined.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Fully-fashioned trainers in mesh with imitation leather details. Ribbed elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend with a burnout pattern.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a round neckline. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Cropped top in double-layered jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short top in ribbed cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Short, boxy-style jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets.
Fitted, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a deep V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Fixed drawstring down the front to create a draped effect.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Sandals in woven fabric with an adjustable, lightly padded hook and loop tab at the front and at the back of the heel. Moulded rubber soles, fluted underneath.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a layered, tiered skirt. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with crossover flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders. Elastication at the top to make the swimsuit easy to put on and take off.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a softly draping weave with a V-neck, flutter sleeves and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs. Lined at the top.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Dungaree shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with straps that cross at the back. Elastication at the back of the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Lined at the top.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Text print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed hem and an appliqué on the front.
Waist bag in a sturdy weave with an appliqué on the front, zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Adjustable waist belt with a plastic fastener. Size 3.5x12x19.5 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Gently flared jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck at the back and ties that can be tied horizontally in a bow at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with roll edges and a roll-edge hem.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a frill-trimmed seam at the top, buttons at the back and flared skirt. Unlined.
Suede ankle boots with peep toes and a frayed-end drawstring on the shaft. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
V-neck top in viscose jersey with short sleeves.
Trousers in a soft viscose twill weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, welt back pockets and a leg pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded top edge, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Padded, detachable hood with an elastic drawstring and a fleece-lined stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets with snow flaps, patch pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening, and one inner pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed, elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in an organic cotton weave with pleats and inset lace trims made from recycled polyester. Frill-trimmed, stand-up collar, wide 3/4-length sleeves, buttons at the back and a sewn-on tie belt at the hem that ties at the back.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and patch pockets. Lined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Metal necklaces with heart-shaped pendants that have concealed magnets and a snap lock fastening. The necklaces can be worn together or separately. Length 45 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with wide shoulder straps. Seam at the hips with a small frill and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle-length treggings in supersoft corduroy. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Striped swimsuit with a matching hairband. Swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps. Lined front and gusset. Hairband with covered elastic at the back.
